## About Kodi

Kodi represents the powerful open-source media center software that transforms your computer into a comprehensive entertainment hub for managing and playing all your digital media across both macOS and Windows platforms. This versatile media application provides a unified interface for accessing local media files, network streams, and online content through an extensible add-on system that can be customized to suit any entertainment need. The flexible architecture combined with extensive format support makes Kodi the preferred choice for home theater enthusiasts, media collectors, cord-cutters, and anyone seeking a centralized solution for their digital entertainment consumption.

The media center's sophisticated playback engine includes hardware acceleration support for smooth 4K video playback, advanced audio processing for surround sound systems, and intelligent library management that automatically fetches metadata, artwork, and subtitles for your media collection. Whether you're building a home theater PC, organizing extensive movie and TV show libraries, streaming online content through add-ons, enjoying music collections with visualizations, or accessing live TV and radio streams, Kodi delivers a professional media experience with the customization options needed for personalized entertainment setups. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent media experiences whether using macOS systems or Windows computers, while the active open-source development guarantees ongoing improvements and community support.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended for 4K playback)
- 500MB available storage space for application and add-ons
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Graphics card with hardware acceleration support

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 500MB available storage space
- DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
- Adequate storage for media libraries and add-ons

**Music Library** - High-quality audio playback with visualizations and library management

**Live TV & Radio** - Television and radio streaming with electronic program guide
